cast.overview: With dreams of diving abroad, Tsuneo gets a job assisting Josee, an artist whose imagination takes her far beyond her wheelchair. But when the tide turns against them, they push each other to places they never thought possible, and inspire a love fit for a storybook.
cast.title: Josee, the Tiger and the Fish

cast.overview: Shouya Ishida starts bullying the new girl in class, Shouko Nishimiya, because she is deaf. But as the teasing continues, the rest of the class starts to turn on Shouya for his lack of compassion. When they leave elementary school, Shouko and Shouya do not speak to each other again... until an older, wiser Shouya, tormented by his past behaviour, decides he must see Shouko once more. He wants to atone for his sins, but is it already too late...?
cast.title: A Silent Voice: The Movie

details.biography:
Ayano Hamaguchi (濱口 綾乃, Hamaguchi Ayano, born June 14) is a Japanese voice actress (seiyuu) from Yamanashi Prefecture. She is affiliated with BLACK SHIP.

In 2014, she graduated from the Voice Actor Talent Department of the Amusement Media Academy and entered the Mausu Promotion Actor Training School. She joined Mausu Promotion in 2016. She transferred to BACK SHIP April 1, 2024. Her vocal timbre is high. Her hobbies are watching American football, collecting incense, walking in kimono, and playing catch. Her special skills are knitting, softball, and shinobue.
details.name: Ayano Hamaguchi
